title: Chapter 146 - Dear Warrior, You’re Pregnant
body:
Chapter 146 - Dear Warrior, You’re Pregnant


“Th-this is impossible!” Feng Xiao’s eyes went wide in disbelief. He stared at them for a moment before a thought stuck him, and he turned to Mu Xuan frantically.”You have an ability!”


His face fell. He struggled up to escape, but before he could do so, he was forced back down by Mu Xuan’s mental strength.


He paled, staring at them with large, frightened eyes; however, he remained stubborn and shouted out, “It’s too early to be arrogant. Once the other bests find out, the hundreds in District 3 will never let you off…”


Before he could finish his sentence, Mu Xuan opened another space portal. It was about four to five times bigger than the previous one. The next instant, a bunch of people came falling out like dumplings, all of them armed bests.


Once the room was filled, Mu Xuan turned to Feng Xiao, articulating each slowly. “Anymore?”


“…” Everyone


“…” Feng Xiao who was clearly petrified.


Yao Si silently praised her nanny dad; his methods were indeed suave! The group of beasts remained motionless, unable to process the situation.


╮(╯﹏╰）╭


Since Feng Xiao seemed to have gone into a daze, Mu Xuan had no intention of pursing his interrogation. Instead, he walked to the control table and started to type rapidly, his fingers flying across the keyboard. After five minutes, he switched it off and turned to caress Yao Si’s head. “Sisi, the safety systems are back in place.”


“Really!” Yao Si exclaimed when his meaning sunk in. She hurriedly tapped the shoulder of a dazed person beside her. “Manager Yuan, the signal is back. Hurry and contact the galactic police.”


“Ah? Ah!” Manager Yuan took a moment to close his mouth that had fallen open. “Al-alright!” Trembling, he opened his optical computer once more and dialed for the police while repeatedly peeking at the ‘dumplings’ on the ground.


Wasn’t the matter almost finished? Was there a need for the police? What kind of talent did the boss bring along? He seemed like someone capable enough to save the world. And it wasn’t even an exaggeration, but all truth! When compared to such a person, the galactic police paled in comparison!


Manager Yuan and Lu Chen proved to be worthy their status. Even though the matter had escalated, they could deal with it efficiently. After gathering a group, they found the devices that could restrict one’s movements and captured all the ‘dumplings’ that were forced down by Mu Xuan’s mental strength.


In half an hour, the galactic police sent a reply that they had come.


Yao Si joined the typing gang. As the new boss, she felt a need to take the lead. She reached for the restriction device from Lu Chen, but just as she was about to fasten it onto the nearest ‘dumpling’, she felt a surge within her.


This feeling… was of an ability?!


Her heart sank. Turning toward the employee that was heading for Feng Xiao, she shouted out, “Be careful!” She then hurriedly reached to pull that person back.


As expected, the next moment an intense gust of power burst out from Feng Xiao, and he tossed an immobile beast toward her.


“Sisi!” Mu Xuan frowned as the beast tumbled toward them. He formed his mental energy into a ball of strength and directed it at the tumbling bestial. It was enveloped by the mental strength, which made it groan, and seconds after, his tummy exploded, flesh and blood spurting everywhere.


Almost instinctively, a surge of power formed within Yao Si, which she directed toward Feng Xiao. The energy bolted straight at him, building up a vigorous gust of wind.


Bullseye! But Feng Xiao disappeared.


“Particle transportation device!” Lu Chen exclaimed/ “I never expected him to posses such equipment.”


So… he was transported away?


“Mu Xuan..” She turned to him. “Can we bring him back?”


“Not at the moment.” Mu Xuan shook his head. “I need to know his general location to transport him, but the particle transportation device transports at random.”


Yao Si frowned. It wasn’t safe for such a person to be roaming about.


She turned toward the dead beast trapped in the mental strength bubble. After just a short glance, she couldn’t help turning away. It was gruesome! The beast which had been part of the rebellion was missing a good chunk of his body in the stomach area, and the shock on his face was still intact after his death.


Feng Xiao had deliberately exploited the explosion to escape. If Mu Xuan had been any slower, the everyone in the room would have been drenched in the beast’s flesh and blood. No one could have guessed that his hardheartedness was strong enough to use his own people to escape.


His last stunt was enough to leave everyone, even his comrades traumatized. The employee Yao Si had pulled aside was distraught, all the color stripped off his face.


At the time, Yao Si had sensed the surge of her passive ability, and Manager Yuan had also mentioned that the leader of the rebels had an ability, which had led her to the thought that he might be about to do something .


“This… what ability was that?” She had never witnessed an ability that could explode someone internally. Before she could lift her head again, darkness clouded her vision as Mu Xuan shielded her from the sight.


“Explosion!” he replied gravely. He lifted his other hand, sending the dead beasts into an empty room before taking his other one from her hands. “His ability can alter the water molecules in one’s body into something explosive, so…”


So the stomach would just explode? It was a frightening ability, so was that how he was able to control the employees of the Ore Planet? He definitely wasn’t someone to be looked down upon.


But… if his ability was explosion, what would the counter ability be?


Feng Xiao had escaped too quickly so she wasn’t able to see the results!


“The galactic police is here!” Lu Chen exclaimed as an alarm sounded. The remaining employees heaved a sigh of relief while a number of them ran out to welcome the officers.


Without waiting for them to leave the room, a huge group of uniformed and armed men came rushing in.


The galactic police took care of the situation efficiently, capturing all the beasts. According to Lu Chen, a large troop had arrived and was spread out through the various districts. It had been mentioned what had happened when they contacted the galactic police to ensure speed and so the other districts wouldn’t cause unnecessary trouble.


In less than two hours, the catastrophe had been dealt with and all the employees released. However, there was still no news of Feng Xiao. He wasn’t in any of the districts, and despite scouring the planet multiple times, he was still nowhere to be found.


With such a sinister person on the loose, it was quite worrying.


Tensions were strung tight, but after three hours, Feng Xiao came back voluntarily.


With a personalized transportation ship, he suddenly appeared in front of Yao Si.


What was weird was his expression—he no longer had the haughty menacing scowl, but instead his face was tear-stained. The moment he caught sight of Yao Si, he dropped to his knees and started to wail pitifully, huge droplets pouring down his cheeks without end.


“Boss, I was wrong, I was really wrong. I should have never preyed on your things. I was blind! I’m not a human. Please, have a heart, save me! I-I-I really can’t take it anymore!”


“…”


(⊙_⊙)


Ah?! What’s with this situation!


“Boss! I beg you, please retract the ability you cast on my body! Even though my personal life can be messy, I’ve never harmed married women or teased innocent ladies. I have also never let the female kind down in anyway.” He wept as his body convulsed. “I-I-I’m a fully grown man, I-I don’t wish to give birth!”


Yao Si took a closer look at him and saw a huge bump was on his originally muscular body. On closer inspection, there seemed to be something kicking within it.


“Ahah… Pain, pain, pain… I-I’m about to give birth! Save me!” Feng Xiao shrieked as he tumbled around.


“…” Yao Si.


“…” Mu Xuan.


“…” The audience surrounding them.


This… What’s with this situation!


(⊙ o ⊙)


Feng Xiao was preganant? Who did it?


No wait! How did Feng Xiao get pregnant in the first! Wasn’t he a man?!


F*ck!


Yao Si remembered… Feng Xiao had an explosion ability and could erupt other people’s stomachs. Since her ability was his counter… the counter of an empty tummy is… a full tummy!


Her ability was… to impregnate anyone she looked at?!


Flips table!


(╯‵□′)╯︵┻━┻


How is that even possible!
